channel.title: Citrus Limon on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Citrus Limon on funPlantGenes

item.title: CiACS4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: orange1.1g037587m Gene Symbol: CiACS4 Gene Name: Citrus ACC synthase 4 Genome: citrus reference genome Species: Citrus limon Functional Descriptions: Citrus ACC synthase CiACS4 regulates plant height by inhibiting gibberellin biosynthesis.

item.title: CiERF3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CiERF3 Gene Name: ethylene response factor 3 Genome: Species: Citrus limon Functional Descriptions: The CiACS4–CiERF3 complex can bind to the promoters of 2 citrus GA20-oxidase genes, CiGA20ox1 and CiGA20ox2, and suppress their expression.

item.title: CiGA20ox1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CiGA20ox1 Gene Name: GA20-oxidase gene 1 Genome: Species: Citrus limon Functional Descriptions: Further experiments revealed that the CiACS4–CiERF3 complex can bind to the promoters of 2 citrus GA20-oxidase genes, CiGA20ox1 and CiGA20ox2, and suppress their expression.

item.title: CiGA20ox2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CiGA20ox2 Gene Name: GA20-oxidase gene 2 Genome: Species: Citrus limon Functional Descriptions: Further experiments revealed that the CiACS4–CiERF3 complex can bind to the promoters of 2 citrus GA20-oxidase genes, CiGA20ox1 and CiGA20ox2, and suppress their expression.
